name: Magical Girl Leaky Sara
description:
Incontinence is a source of utmost embarrassment for most people. But for Sara Leak, it is also the source of her greatest power! Experience the pinnacle of urinary storytelling as Sara Leak uses her magical powers of incontinence to battle a series of zany enemies in over 70 puzzle levels!

When you're done with the Story Mode, play to relax in Endless Mode or strive to survive in Timed Mode!

Also available for Android!
